items.title: Ether surges, trading close to its record again after Powell speech teasing rate cuts
items.description: The price of ether rebounded to near-record levels on Friday after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell hinted at upcoming rate cuts.

items.title: Where this BlackRock fund manager is finding pockets of opportunity in high-yield bonds
items.description: BlackRock's Mitchell Garfin is focusing on specific sectors and credit ratings in the high-yield market right now.

items.title: Lyft is in a major bottoming-out formation, says Carter Worth
items.description: Carter Worth breaks down a bullish chart formation in the ride-hailing company.

items.title: Citi maintains its bullishness on cloud stock Snowflake ahead of second-quarter earnings
items.description: Citi sees another upside of 28% ahead for shares of Snowflake.

items.title: Barclays upgrades this beauty stock to overweight on the back of its resistance to tariffs
items.description: Barclays analyst Adrienne Yih highlighted Ulta's relative resistance against tariffs and waning U.S. consumer demand.
